credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mr. and Mrs. Talbot Jones Taylor
title: Salesman's sample book
medium:
Medium: leather, paper, wool, cotton
Technique: plain and twill weave, some printed
description: Red, straight-grained Morocco leather portfolio with gilt stamped edges and lettering; green Morocco leather lining; accordion-pleated structure containing 14 panels with 10 samples on each panel and  a top panel of red straight-grained Morocco leather; 16 panels of 10 samples each on other side. Samples are plain and twill weave wool, wool and cotton twills, cotton cloths and twills; some sized and printed with fine check print.
name: Salesman's sample book
